attributes.action: Revoke Article 50 and re-negotiate UK terms of membership of the EU
attributes.additional_details: The deal should have been negotiated before the referendum so there was a chance to vote on it. If we leave without a deal there is no going back.
attributes.background: The British electorate were not given all the facts to make an informed decision to vote in the EU referendum.  The choice was too simplistic - leave or remain. There was not an opportunity to vote for or against a deal.
